section.title: Manage Gadgets
section.para: Gadgets are a small convenient applications that help portal users perform private actions. &PRODUCT; provides you with some gadgets by default (see .
In addition to these ready-to-use gadgets, &PRODUCT; allows you to easily add gadgets organized in categories to meet your needs.

section.title: Manage Gadget Categories

step.para: Open the User Workspace on your left pane.
Click the tool icon to add a new category
The Gadget Containers Management dialog appears:
Click the add icon to show the Gadget Container Form .

listitem.para: The display name of the category. This field is required and must have at least 3 characters.
The brief description of the category. A length from 0 to 255 characters is allowed. This field is not required.

step.para: Enter values for fields in the Gadget Container Form .
Click on the Save button to accept the new category or click Cancel to quit. After you added the new category you will see it in the dialog :

formalpara.title: Edit Categories
formalpara.para: Edit the information of an existing category by selecting it from the left pane, the selected category is marked by a symbol. Then click the edit icon to show the edit form. Change the current category information and click on the button to accept changes.

formalpara.title: Deleting a Category
formalpara.para: Delete an existing category by selecting it from the left pane. In the message box Click on the OK button to confirm the deletion or click the Cancel button.

section.para: Click on the Save button in the Gadget Containers Management dialog to accept or on the Cancel button to quit. Added categories will be displayed in list in the User Workspace.

step.para: Click the list icon to see category list and select the one you want to add a gadget to.
Click the add icon at the bottom of the User Workspace to open the Add Application dialog:

Select a gadget by clicking the add icon (located next to the the gadget). The selected gadget is displayed immediately in the user workspace. Normally, you can see only two gadgets in the User Workspace. When there are more gadgets, some gadgets are not visible.
Click the scroll down icon or the scroll up icon at the bottom of the User Workspace to see the other gadgets. The scroll icons will be greyed out when you reach the end of the available gadgets.

section.title: Edit a Gadget
section.para: To edit a gadget, click the edit icon.

section.title: Remove a Gadget
section.para: Remove a gadget from the User Workspace by using the functional bar at the upper right corner of that gadget.
Click the remove icon. When the confirmation message appears, click the OK button to accept or the Cancel to quit.
